data.text: Awurade, wo mu na maguan ahintaw;
Wo trenee no nti, yi me na gye me;
Yɛ me nkwagye botan,
Me Nyankopɔn, gye me fi amumɔyɛfo nsam,
Na woayɛ mʼanidaso, Asafo Awurade,
Mede me ho ato wo so fi awo mu;
Mayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ama bebree,
Wo nkamfo ahyɛ mʼanom ma,
Ntow me nkyene bere a mabɔ akwakoraa;
Efisɛ mʼatamfo kasa tia me
Wɔka se, “Onyankopɔn agyaw no mu;
Me Nyankopɔn, mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri;
Ma wɔn a wɔbɔ me sobo no nsɛe wɔ animguase mu;
Nanso me de, menya anidaso daa;
Mɛka wo trenee ho asɛm,
Otumfo Awurade, mɛba abɛpae mu aka wo nnwuma akɛse no;
Onyankopɔn, efi me mmabun bere na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ me,
Mpo sɛ mebɔ akwakoraa na mifuw dwen a,
Onyankopɔn, wo trenee du ɔsorosoro,
Mmom woama mahu ɔhaw bebree a ɛyɛ yaw;
Wobɛhyɛ me anuonyam bebree
Mede sanku bɛkamfo wo
Mʼanofafa de anigye bɛteɛ mu
Me tɛkrɛma bɛka wo trenee nnwuma
